title: Mad Flow (feat. Brendan Sagalow & Ian Fidance)
description:
Brendan Sagalow and Ian Fidance join The Bonfire and Brendan defends his rap song as Ian supports him.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
